channel.title: Help - How do i make admins glow ?!?
channel.description: PLEASE help me, my server wackysacpe has cool mods and admins and we were wondering if there is anyone out there that knows how to make admins/mods glow or fly. I need this so that mods and admins stand out from other player etc.. if you help me and get it to work ill give you repp xDDDD
